Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
chintzy \chintzy\ adj. 1. resembling chintz or decorated with chintz. [PJC]
2. of very poor quality. [informal]
Syn: bum, cheap, cheesy, crummy, punk, sleazy, tatty, tinny, chinchy. [WordNet 1.5]
3. stingy; miserly.
Syn: cheap. [PJC]
chintzy adj 1: of very poor quality [syn: {bum}, {cheap}, {cheesy}, {crummy}, {punk}, {sleazy}, {tinny}] 2: embarrassingly stingy [syn: {cheap}, {chinchy}] [also: {chintziest}, {chintzier}]
